short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun game that plays in a popup

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tetrys Game is a fun and addictive puzzle game that you can play right in your browser! This extension brings the classic block-stacking gameplay to a convenient popup, allowing you to enjoy quick gaming sessions without leaving your current webpage.
Features:

- Classic Tetris-style gameplay
- Sleek, minimalist design
- Responsive controls using arrow keys or WASD
- High score tracking
- Pause and resume functionality
- Quick access through browser toolbar

Perfect for short breaks or when you need a quick distraction, Tetrys Game offers the timeless joy of fitting falling blocks together. Challenge yourself to beat your high score or simply enjoy the satisfying feeling of clearing lines.

Whether you're a longtime fan of block-stacking games or new to the genre, Tetrys Game provides an enjoyable experience for all skill levels. Install now and start stacking!

Note: This game is inspired by the classic Tetris but is an independent creation and not affiliated with or endorsed by the owners of TetrisÂ®.
